page.title: 13HOME LIFE IN WEST NOTTINGHAM
page.content: We looked at 'home life' in our area and our survey found that the majority of people got up between{7.00-8.00am.} and had breakfast of cereal and a cup of tea.At about {12:00}most people had a light lunch though some missed it. Most people had their{main meal}at {night;}it usually included some kind of meat.Approx.{25%}had their meals as a{family group}. { Bedtime}was generally between { {11.00-12.00pm.}Very few people read in bed-they went straight to sleep. {90% }of our survey did not watch 'Breakfast Television',but listened to the{local radio}stations Nottingham & Trent. Not a lot of people had {pets},though the majority of the {25%}who did were elderly; they had mainly birds or dogs.Many houses were safety and security conscious.
